jade:
~doctype html
html(data-use-rem)
  head
    meta(charset="utf-8")
    meta(name="format-detection", content="telephone=no")
    meta(name="viewport", content="width=device-width,initial-scale=1, maximum-scale=1, minimum-scale=1, user-scalable=no")
    meta(name="apple-mobile-web-app-capable", content="yes")
    meta(name="apple-mobile-web-app-status-bar-style", content="black")
    meta(name="description",content="")
    meta(name="keywords",content="")
    title 标题
    link(rel="stylesheet",href="../css/index.css")
  body(ontouchstart="")~)

~doctype html
html
  head
    meta(charset="utf-8")
    meta(name="viewport", content="width=device-width,initial-scale=1, maximum-scale=1, minimum-scale=1, user-scalable=no")
    meta(content="telephone=no" name="format-detection")
    meta(name="description", content="销售家电、数码通讯、电脑、家居百货、服装服饰、母婴、图书、食品等数万个品牌优质商品.便捷、诚信的服务，为您提供愉悦的网上购物体验!")
    meta(name="Keywords", content="网上购物,网上商城,手机,笔记本,电脑,MP3,CD,VCD,DV,相机,数码,配件,手表,存储卡")
    title  QQ购物号
    link(rel="stylesheet", href="../css/index.css")
  body(ontouchstart="")~)

~doctype html
html
  head
    meta(charset="utf-8")
    meta(http-equiv="X-UA-Compatible" content="IE=edge")
    title  健康
    meta(name="viewport", content="width=device-width,initial-scale=1, maximum-scale=1, minimum-scale=1, user-scalable=no")
    meta(content="telephone=no" name="format-detection")
    link(rel="stylesheet", href="../css/index.css")
  body(ontouchstart="")~)

~doctype html
html
  head
    meta(charset="utf-8")
    meta(name="viewport", content="width=device-width,initial-scale=1, maximum-scale=1, minimum-scale=1, user-scalable=no")
    meta(content="telephone=no" name="format-detection")
    meta(name="description", content="个性化你的QQ，在整个QQ平台展示自己的个性和主张，勇敢做自己！QQ个性装扮为你提供海量大表情，沟通无极限，个性气泡、主题、挂件、字体，全真展示自己。")
    meta(name="keywords", content="装扮，腾讯，QQ，手机，表情，气泡，主题，挂件，字体，铃声，彩铃，个性，背景，封面，图片，动态")
    title 厘米秀
    link(rel="stylesheet", href="../css/index.css")
  body(ontouchstart="")~)

~ul.list.list-rule
  li
    var.decimal 1
    h4 本活动仅限已获得厘米秀资格的用户参与
  li
    var.decimal 2
    h4 本活动需安装6.3.5及以上的手机QQ版本
  li
    var.decimal 3
    h4 本活动共有8个奖品，在神枪手挑战中击中目标，即可获得相应奖品
  li
    var.decimal 4
    h4 每轮游戏限时10S，子弹8发，可以多次挑战获得更好成绩哦
  li
    var.decimal 5
    h4 在法律允许范围内，腾讯公司拥有最终解释权，对本活动有任何疑问或咨询，请联系腾讯在线客服反馈，反馈地址：kf.qq.com~)

~background-image: -webkit-gradient(

css:
~.ui-btn{position:relative;height:30px;line-height:30px;padding:0 11px;min-width:55px;display:inline-block;vertical-align:top;font-size:15px;text-align:center;background-color:#fdfdfd;background-image:-webkit-gradient(linear, left top, left bottom, color-stop(0.5, #fff), to(#fafafa));color:#777777;-webkit-box-sizing:border-box;-webkit-background-clip:padding-box;border:1px solid #cacccd;border-radius:3px}@media screen and (-webkit-min-device-pixel-ratio: 2){.ui-btn{position:relative;border:0}.ui-btn:before{content:"";width:200%;height:200%;position:absolute;top:0;left:0;border:1px solid #cacccd;-webkit-transform:scale(0.5);-webkit-transform-origin:0 0;padding:1px;-webkit-box-sizing:border-box;border-radius:6px;pointer-events:none}}.ui-btn:not(.disabled):not(:disabled):active,.ui-btn.active{background:#f2f2f2;color:#999999;-webkit-background-clip:padding-box}.ui-btn.disabled,.ui-btn:disabled{border:0;color:#ccc;background:#e9ebec;background-clip:padding-box}@media screen and (-webkit-min-device-pixel-ratio: 2){.ui-btn{border:0}.ui-btn.disabled,.ui-btn:disabled,.ui-btn.disabled:before,.ui-btn:disabled:before{border:1px solid #e9ebec}}
~)

~.ui-btn-primary{background-color:#12b7f5;border-color:#12b7f5;background-image:-webkit-gradient(linear, left top, left bottom, color-stop(0.5, #12b7f5), to(#12b7f5));color:#fff;background-clip:padding-box}.ui-btn-primary:not(.disabled):not(:disabled):active,.ui-btn-primary.active{background:#21c0fc;border-color:#21c0fc;color:rgba(255,255,255,0.5);background-clip:padding-box}@media screen and (-webkit-min-device-pixel-ratio: 2){.ui-btn-primary:before{border:1px solid #12b7f5}}
~)

~.ui-btn-danger{background-color:#f75549;background-image:-webkit-gradient(linear, left top, left bottom, color-stop(0.5, #fc6156), to(#f75549));color:#fff;border-color:#f43d30;background-clip:padding-box}.ui-btn-danger:not(.disabled):not(:disabled):active,.ui-btn-danger.active{background:#e2574d;border-color:#e2574d;color:rgba(255,255,255,0.5);background-clip:padding-box}@media screen and (-webkit-min-device-pixel-ratio: 2){.ui-btn-danger:before{border:1px solid #f43d30}}
~)

~.c-border-t{border-top:1px solid #e0e0e0}@media screen and (-webkit-min-device-pixel-ratio: 2){.c-border-t{border:0;background-position:left top;background-repeat:repeat-x;-webkit-background-size:100% 1px;background-image:-webkit-gradient(linear, left bottom, left top, color-stop(0.5, transparent), color-stop(0.5, #e0e0e0))}}
~)

~.c-border-b{border-bottom:1px solid #e0e0e0}@media screen and (-webkit-min-device-pixel-ratio: 2){.c-border-b{border:0;background-position:left bottom;background-repeat:repeat-x;-webkit-background-size:100% 1px;background-image:-webkit-gradient(linear, left top, left bottom, color-stop(0.5, transparent), color-stop(0.5, #e0e0e0))}}
~)

~.c-border-l{border-left:1px solid #e0e0e0}@media screen and (-webkit-min-device-pixel-ratio: 2){.c-border-l{border:0;background-position:left top;background-repeat:repeat-y;-webkit-background-size:1px 100%;background-image:-webkit-gradient(linear, left top, right top, color-stop(0, #e0e0e0), color-stop(0.5, #e0e0e0), color-stop(0.5, transparent))}}
~)

~.c-border-r{border-right:1px solid #e0e0e0}@media screen and (-webkit-min-device-pixel-ratio: 2){.c-border-r{border:0;background-position:right top;background-repeat:repeat-y;-webkit-background-size:1px 100%;background-image:-webkit-gradient(linear, left top, right top, color-stop(0.5, transparent), color-stop(0.5, #e0e0e0))}}
~)

~.c-border-tb{border-top:1px solid #e0e0e0;border-bottom:1px solid #e0e0e0;background-image:none}@media screen and (-webkit-min-device-pixel-ratio: 2){.c-border-tb{border:0;background-repeat:repeat-x;-webkit-background-size:100% 1px;background-position:top, bottom;background-image:-webkit-gradient(linear, left bottom, left top, color-stop(0.5, transparent), color-stop(0.5, #e0e0e0)),-webkit-gradient(linear, left top, left bottom, color-stop(0.5, transparent), color-stop(0.5, #e0e0e0))}}
~)

~.ec-textblock-list{overflow:hidden}.ec-textblock-list li{float:left;padding:0 10px;margin:6px;height:30px;line-height:30px;color:#000;border:1px solid #DEDEDE;-webkit-box-sizing:border-box;border-radius:30px;background-color:#fff}.ec-textblock-list li:active{background-color:#e5e6e7}@media screen and (-webkit-min-device-pixel-ratio: 2){.ec-textblock-list>li{position:relative;border:0}.ec-textblock-list>li:before{content:"";position:absolute;top:0;left:0;width:200%;height:200%;border:1px solid #DEDEDE;-webkit-transform:scale(0.5);-webkit-transform-origin:0 0;-webkit-box-sizing:border-box;border-radius:60px;pointer-events:none}}
~)

~background-image: -webkit-gradient(
  linear,
  left top, 
  left bottom, 
  from(rgba(255,0,1)),
  color-stop(.5, #fff), 
  to(rgba(0,255,0,1))
);~)
